actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase the amount which is authorized by Public Law 92-287 to be appropriated for the establishment of a metallurgy research center on the Fort Douglas Military Reservation, Utah, in replacement of the facility now located on the campus of the University of Utah.

summary.text: Increases the amount authorized to be appropriated for the establishment of a metallurgy research center on the Fort Douglas Military Reservation, Utah, in replacement of the facility now located on the campus of the University of Utah.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount which is authorized by Public Law 92-287 to be appropriated for the establishment of a metallurgy research center on the Fort Douglas Military Reservation, Utah, in replacement of the facility now located on the campus of the University of Utah.
